title: [Glatoph, Glacier]
description: The side of the mountain is blanketed with white, the glittering ice and snow glaring into your eyes.  Everywhere you look is cold and white and bare, as though the whole world has frozen.

The side of the mountain is blanketed with snow and ice, the blue-white gleam of it in the darkness toying with your sense of perspective.  Everywhere you look is cold and lifeless and bare, as though the whole world has frozen.
